article_title: Kentucky congressional candidates Barr, Jensen find little common ground during KET debate
article_text: Democrat Elisabeth Jensen told Kentucky Tonight host Bill Goodman that she supported a proposed raise in the federal minimum wage to $10.10 an hour, the Affordable Care Act and the Dodd-Frank banking reform law. Incumbent Republican Andy Barr said he opposed all of those, preferring free-market solutions over government intervention.

article_metadata.title: Kentucky congressional candidates Barr, Jensen find little common ground during KET debate | Lexington Herald-Leader
